title: Batman - The Television Series - Bonus (Special) Features [DVDRi
description:
Batman - The Television Series - Bonus (Special) Features [DVDRip]

The original Batman television series, from the 1960's has finally been released completely uncut and digitally remastered. 

In this torrent, you will find the bonus features that were included on the final disc of the complete series set. They are:

1. Hanging with Batman Ã¢â‚¬â€œ A true slice of life in the words of Adam West.
2. Holy Memorabilia Batman! Ã¢â‚¬â€œ A journey into the most sought after collectables through the eyes of 3 extraordinary collectors.
3. Batmania Born! - Building the World of Batman Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Explore the art and design behind the fiction.
4. Bats of the Round Table Ã¢â‚¬â€œ  A candid conversation with Adam West and his celebrity friends, chatting all things Bat Ã¢â‚¬â„¢66.
5. Inventing Batman in the words of Adam West (episode 1 &2) -  A rare treat for the fans as Adam discusses his script notes on bringing Batman to life in the first and second episodes.
6. Na Na Na Batman! Ã¢â‚¬â€ Hollywood favorites stars and producers recount their favorite Batman memories.
7. Actors Screen Tests - Lyle Waggoner And Peter Deyell.
8. Burt Ward Screen Test With Adam West.
9. Batgirl Pilot.
10. James Blakeley Tribute.

***Season three (the final season) coming soon.
